scripts.dev: rm -rf .webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls offline start --stage dev
scripts.dev-todo: cd src/todo && rm -rf .webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=offline sls offline start --stage offline
scripts.dev-passport: cd src/passport && rm -rf .webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=offline sls offline start --stage offline
scripts.deploy-prod: rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod sls deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy-dev: rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --stage dev --verbose
scripts.deploy-todo-dev: cd src/todo && rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy-passport-dev: cd src/passport && rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --verbose --stage dev
scripts.deploy-dev-blue: rm -rf .webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev-blue sls deploy --stage dev-blue
scripts.deploy-dev-green: rm -rf .webpack && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev-green sls deploy --stage dev-green
scripts.remove-todo-dev: cd src/todo && rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls remove --stage dev
scripts.remove-passport-dev: cd src/passport && rm -rf .webpack .serverless && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls remove --stage dev
